item.title: Help with muting
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Mines pretty much the same

case 4: // regular chat String playerchat = "[" + playerName + "]: " + Misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2) + ""; if (!validClient) { sM("Please use another client"); break; } if (muted) break; MBTC = Misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBBC = Misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBHT = Misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBID = Misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); chatTextEffects = inStream.readUnsignedByteS(); chatTextColor = inStream.readUnsignedByteS(); chatTextSize = (byte) (packetSize - 2); inStream.readBytes_reverseA(chatText, chatTextSize, 0); chatTextUpdateRequired = true; break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with muting
item.dc:creator: @Silent_Assassin Silent Assassin
item.description:
@Silent_Assassin wrote:

Maybe case 4 isn’t my chat packet because it didn’t work :(.

Do you have a sample line from your chat packet so I can find mine? Or maybe your whole chat packet so I have a few options to search for.

And you fixed the compiling error, many thanks.

item.title: Help with muting
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

case 4: if (token.equals("character-look")) { playerLooks[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer .parseInt(token3[1]); break; } if(muted) break; MBTC = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBBC = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBHT = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBID = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); chatTextEffects = inStream.readUnsignedByteS(); chatTextColor = inStream.readUnsignedByteS(); chatTextSize = (byte) (packetSize - 2); inStream.readBytes_reverseA(chatText, chatTextSize, 0); chatTextUpdateRequired = true; break;
That would fix the error, but why is that first part in your chat packet?

if (token.equals(“character-look”)) {
playerLooks[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer
.parseInt(token3[1]);
break;

item.title: Help with muting
item.dc:creator: @Silent_Assassin Silent Assassin
item.description:
@Silent_Assassin wrote:

Trying to get mute working correctly in my server. I have a command that writes to the mute list but when the person logs in they can still talk.

Here is my class 4 and the error I get when I compile. Can anybody tell me what’s wrong with it?

[code] case 4:
if (token.equals(“character-look”)) {
playerLooks[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer
.parseInt(token3[1]);
}
break;

				if(muted)
				break;
				MBTC = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2);
				MBBC = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2);
				MBHT = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2);
				MBID = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2);
				chatTextEffects = inStream.readUnsignedByteS();
				chatTextColor = inStream.readUnsignedByteS();
				chatTextSize = (byte) (packetSize - 2);
				inStream.readBytes_reverseA(chatText, chatTextSize, 0);
				chatTextUpdateRequired = true;
				break;[/code]

client.java:11135: unreachable statement if(muted) ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I am using a Delta source.

Read full topic
